General.Name: Aeon Motor Co Ltd
General.Description: Aeon Motor Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacturing, and sale of scooters, ATVs, UTVs, motorcycles, and electric vehicles under the Aeon brand name in Taiwan. The company provides parts and other products. It is also involved in the exporting activities. Aeon Motor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

2.Name: Jun Jie  Yu
2.Title: Mang. of Quality Control Department and Director
